entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:26 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
